description.p: Project leader for developing physics and data based prediction software.

bulletedlist.item: Leveraged industry contacts to secure software licenses and access open-source solutions, accelerating the modeling program by five years and achieving a cost savings of \$1MM.
Principal investigator on research developing methods to compare open-source drill string models.

Developed a generalized Python library to analyze and plot high-frequency time-series data. The library includes signal processing algorithms, finite precision arithmetic mathematics, automatic units handling, and a separation of interests design. Saves 70-95\% of code writing.
Designed LLM prompts to summarize large documents and extract structured content from document collections. Achieved a 95\% reduction in data summarization and report writing time.
Managed software projects utilizing in-house and third party resources.
Mentored and guided software developers and researchers.
